title: As a developer I want the R4 Swagger documentation to be fixed
custom_steps: The upgrade to using spring boot/spring 5 broke swagger in the r4 API project.  That needs to be fixed.

title: As a Club User, I want to see a Req Turnaround Column on my Drug Test Request Widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789983/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery

Wireframe: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_club

AC:
 - There will be a new 'Req Turnaround' column added to Clubs' Drug Test Request widget
 - The new column will appear after the request date column
 - The value in this column will display the value entered in the Request Turnaround field on the request:
  -- Standard
  -- Expedited

title: As a Club User, I want to see a Consent Form column on my Drug Test Request Widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789983/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery

Wireframe: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_club

AC:
 - There will be a new Consent Form column added to the Clubs' Drug Test Request widget
 - If a consent form is attached to the request, a paperclip icon will be displayed
 - Clicking the paperclip icon will download/open the attached form

title: As a Club User, I want to see an At Academy column on my Drug Test Request Widget
custom_steps:
Will show dates from Form

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789983/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery

Wireframe: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_club

AC:
 - There will be a new At Academy column added to the Club's Drug Test Request widget
 - The column will appear at the end of the widget
 - If the Club answered Yes to the 'Is the player at your academy?' question on the request, this column will display the arrival and departure dates
 - If the Club answered no, this column will be blank
 - The column will be formatted as "mm/dd/yy - mm/dd/yy"

title: As User, I want to see a new Current Location section Drug Test Request Form
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789986/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery 

AC:
 - There will be a new Current Location section on the Drug Test Request Form
 - The section will contain a Country dropdown and 3 Address Lines
 - Country is required
 - At least one Address Line is required

title: As Club User, I want to see a new Test Country column on my Drug Test Request widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789983/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery

Wireframe: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_club

AC:
 - There will be a new 'Test Country' column on the Clubs' Drug Test Request widget
 - The column will appear after the Status column
 - The column will be populated with the Country value in the Current Location section of the Drug Test Request form

title: As Club User, I want to edit a Drug Test Request to upload a consent form
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Club will see an edit button when viewing a request that is in the following states:
  -- Submitted
  -- Consent Form Pending
 - Clicking the Edit button will make the Attached Files portion of the form editable
  -- All other sections will remain uneditable

title: As a Reg Analyst, I want to see the Req Turnaround Column on my Drug Test Request Widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3799155/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery

AC:
 - The 'Reg Turnaround' column on the Reg Analyst Drug Test Request widget will be updated to display the value entered in the Request Turnaround field on the request:
  -- Standard
  -- Expedited

title: As Reg Analyst, I want to see a new Test Country column on my Drug Test Request widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3799155/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery

AC:
 - There will be a new 'Test Country' column on the Reg Analysts' Drug Test Request widget
 - The column will appear after the Status column
 - The column will be populated with the Country value in the Current Location section of the Drug Test Request form

title: As a Reg Analyst, I want to see an At Academy column on my Drug Test Request Widget
custom_steps:
Will show dates from Form

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3799155/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery

AC:
 - There will be a new At Academy column added to the Reg Analyst's Drug Test Request widget
 - The column will appear at the end of the widget
 - If the Club answered Yes to the 'Is the player at your academy?' question on the request, this column will display the arrival and departure dates
 - If the Club answered no, this column will be blank
 - The column will be formatted as "mm/dd/yy - mm/dd/yy"

title: As Reg Analyst, I want to edit a Drug Test Request to add a phone number
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Reg Analysts will see an edit button when viewing a request that is in the following states:
  -- Consent Assigned
 - Clicking the Edit button will make the Phone Number section of the form editable
  -- All other sections will remain uneditable

title: I want see Current Location info added to ebis Link
